title: I’m a graduate of Information Technology and been looking for a job for almost a year now. Any suggestion or ideas where I can find job? Do you know any job vacancies in your area? - Quora

response.answer_text: I can give u 2 tips from first hand experience:-1) Volunteer to work for free for a certain period2) Aim at Start up Companies. As Norbert indicated, if you are in India, there are plenty of start ups which u can find. Other than these, One more option which i see is Enrolling into on Job training Programs offered by various institutes. Yes you need to shell out a few bucks but on Job training means , Real Work Experience to put on your resume.
